articles.content: As you may know by now, Riot’s new tactical FPS, Valorant, has an anti-cheat system that’s come under fire over the last few weeks for allegedly being a bit invasive. The reason for this is that the software, named Vanguard, runs a kernel-level driver at star… [+2903 chars]

articles.title: Battlefront 2's final update arrives today, as Dice shift to the next Battlefield - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Dice are waving goodbye to Battlefront 2 with today’s last update, letting people duke it out on Scarif, better known as ‘that planet from the end of Rogue One’
articles.content: War never changes, but sometimes old wars wind down so we can have a bash at new ones. Dice are waving goodbye to Battlefront 2 with today’s final update, letting people duke it out on Scarif – better known as ‘that planet from the end of Rogue One’. There ar… [+1856 chars]

articles.author: Sam Sheehan
articles.title: New BMW 4 Series details confirmed - Pistonheads.com
articles.description: Hybrid 374hp M440i xDrive will top range, with all variants to be given a sportier setup than G20 3 Series equivalents
articles.content: BMW is in the final stages of development stage for its all-new 4 Series, a car that the manufacturer has promised will take the dynamic merits of its G20-series platform to new heights - and be spearheaded by a 374hp M440i xDrive. Sharing much of its archite… [+3287 chars]

articles.author: Harry Pettit
articles.title: WhatsApp warns ‘spying firm’ helped hack HUNDREDS of users’ texts – with a single phone call - The Sun
articles.content:
WHATSAPP has accused a shadowy Israeli spyware firm of helping to hack the messages of more than a thousand users.
NSO Group is alleged to have created software used by nation state security forces to spy on senior government officials, journalists, and huma… [+4789 chars]

articles.author: Becky Roberts
articles.title: PS Audio Stellar M1200 mono power amp marries valve input with Class D output - What Hi-Fi?
articles.description: The 600-watt M1200 will start shipping in May or June for £6000 a pair.
articles.content:
PS Audios new Stellar M1200 began as a dream project of PS engineer Darren Myers, who wanted to see what would happen if he combined one of the worlds highest power amplifier stages with a rich and warm vacuum tube input stage.
The result? A monoblock power … [+980 chars]

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: Apple plans iMac and MacBook Pro redesigns: why your Mac is about to look very outdated - Express
articles.description: APPLE is hard at work on a new MacBook Pro and iMac model with slimmer bezels to bring more screen real estate, according to the latest whispers from the supply chain. Here's everything we need to know about this potentially must-have upgrade.
